title: Edward Johnston exhibit at Ditchling
content: Delete it was last year - this 2007 thing is rough.
author: londontype

comments.content: It ended 1st October 2006! Thanks for sharing though.

B\*gger, I think it was last year tho' Brad…

If it's any consolation, I'm probably even more annoyed that I missed it than you are. It would have made a great reason to have a day out in the Sussex countryside (and it's probably only about an hour and a half's drive).

Brad,  
If you're in the Ditcling area in September  
there's the **[ATypI](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713190143/http:/www.atypi.org/news_tool/news_html?newsid=378&from=)** conference.
